column3: Vanyarin ) was the father-name of Maedhros
column4: eldest son of Fëanor. Formed by adding up the Quenya adjective nelya
column5: which means "third" to the name of his Finwë
column6: it can be translated as "Third Finwë".
column7: The names of the Sons of Fëanor with the legend of the fate of Amrod  The name was not used in Middle-earth since the Noldor exiles spoke Sindarin there after Thingols decree.
